name: dvelimh
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))

|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)))

|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))

comment: Version of ~ dvelim without any variable restrictions. (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2002.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-May-2018.)
